remarks: The Tarski-Grothendieck axiom using abbreviations.  This version is called Tarski's axiom: given a set ` x ` , there exists a set ` y ` containing ` x ` , the subsets of the members of ` y ` , the power sets of the members of ` y ` , and the subsets of ` y ` of cardinality less than that of ` y ` .  (Contributed by NM, 21-Jun-2009.)
statement:
axgroth6 $p |- E. y ( x e. y /\ A. z e. y ( ~P z C_ y /\ ~P z e. y ) /\ A. z e. ~P y ( z ~< y -> z e. y ) ) $.
$d x y z $.
